lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, things don't look like they normally do-- for us either, Matt's over there! He's sitting right there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very weird from this perspective.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look so little, over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look about the same size to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're hoping to have something fun for you guys soon because of it, so really, thank you for taking the time to do it. And we will take that data, and I will eat it. Merch! I'm going to throw it to Laura, because that's what you do, you throw merch to Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have merch in the store. We're all out of dice, but yo, we've got the t-shirts, we got some hats, we got patches and vinyl stickers. We got all sorts of shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, our store go hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to the store!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pop some tags.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it's 4/20, the store kind of looks like a weed dispensary. But it's not. It's a straight-up Geek and Sundry store.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should look into Critical Role cannabis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that'd be so good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weed and Sundry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That'd be pretty tight.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting fired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone knows it's true. Everyone in this building knows it's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We just lost Jeff Sessions as a fan. Sorry, Jeff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that available as merch, by the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just see me out back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god, how do you herd seven cats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know! How do you do it, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Taliesin, tell us about this Wednesday Club thing you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. This week on Wednesday Club, we thought it would be fun to delve into manga! That's right, there's a new camera here, that's crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no, I was looking at the wrong one because it's so bright.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the one we're looking at.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll have to flag that off, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's like the HAL 9000.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the cameras feel like eavesdroppers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's fine. You're a baby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can turn it down more. Can we tilt down this red light more? So it's not in their eyes? Okay. Keep going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be a lot of fun. Join us, we may have a guest, we may not, I'm not entirely sure. I've just been so delighted by this, I've ignored everything else in my life. Wednesdays at noon on this very channel, where you are right now. Come check it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On to you for Signal Boost?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's a badass MMA fighter who always shows up to her weigh-ins in cosplay. She's dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was like the best thing ever. It was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's rad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a very accurate outfit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And guess who's up next week?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, high school awkward pose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha Ray?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Liam O'Brien.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Liam O'Brien!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's taking over all the shows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Yes, I'm doing Wednesday Club. I'm the President of Nerdist as well!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam and Sundry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Liam and Sundry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, also, Marisha, Taliesin, and Matthew here, are going to Momocon! For my birthday weekend, on May 25th through 28th. I won't be here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey. We share that birthday weekend, don't just call it yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so go see them if you're in the vicinity of Atlanta, Georgia. Also, I think this is the time for you to give us an announcement about a project you're working on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, it just got announced! A new game that I'm working on called Farpoint! Got a story trailer for it, it's a VR game for Sony PlayStation VR, it's totally cool. I tweeted out the story trailers, if you want to go check it out. It looks super awesome, and it was so fun to work on, and the story was really awesome too. And then last week, we released a cinematic trailer for Uncharted: The Lost Legacy! And got a release date for it, which is August 22nd, which I'm very excited about, as well!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Air punch it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo woo!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good! That's perfect. Also, Talks Machina is live on Tuesday nights. 7PM on Twitch. Don't forget to submit your gif and fanart of the week, use TalksMachina@gmail.com. Matt, you had something you wanted to throw out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, when we did the charity drive, where we played Mansions of Madness, about a month or so ago, one of the things that I said off-the-cuff was that if we got a certain point, a certain donation list, I'd do a two-hour hangout Q and A, and then Brian Foster said that if we make even more, he'll do it in a silk robe. Well we hit both those goals, we finally scheduled it. I know, yeah, yeah you get to talk to him about that today.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He has so many silk robes, so it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, I ordered one. It's awful. It's going to be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it purple? Tell me it's purple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's red. It's bright red.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heinous. But, next Tuesday, from 4 to 6PM, here on the Twitch channel, it's going to be a date with me and the chat. For two hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to be awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to have wine, and a nice robe, and it's going to be kind of like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to have dinner-- no, he's going to have dinner in like POV.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to figure that out. I'm hoping to do that. What was the Christopher Walken character? With the wine?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the Continental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm hoping it's something like that. It's kind of what I'm going for. But anyway, during that time also, I'm going to finally make up on those promises even on an older charity, where I'm going to work with the chat to create an NPC for Critical Role and create a possible future encounter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we should watch that so we know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's next Tuesday, at 4 to 6PM Pacific here on Twitch. Thank you, Liam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, it's going to be you and then Talks at 7PM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Talks at 7PM, yeah, so it's going to be a nice little transition.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're going to be back in stock in May, and you'll be able to find them probably in your local store, but if not, on the Paizo webstore. I've been asked a hundred times about thesel

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you spell Paizo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: P-A-I-Z-O.com.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question about those, are they edible like the ones in Fraggle Rock?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Are they made out of radishes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you try hard enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have wanted to eat those my entire life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, dude. Dude, those structures are legit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot about those!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you might have a half-elf ranger in your party who is obsessed and will do anything and everything to fucking fly. Boom. Done. There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, because when I bought those for you, way before we even thought about having a show, back when we very first started dating, I'm pretty sure they just custom-made those. Julian custom-made those himself and just sold them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just sold them in a box in the store.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now, I think, because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, the whole internet explosion in media, D&D.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they're starting to make them on mass scale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They will be readily available in May, and I'll make sure to update Critters as that happens, so thank you. Thank you Hero Forge, and thank you Emerald Knights. Gorgeous. Boink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have something to say, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Let's hear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have an announcement, and neither does Ashley. So Ashley, how you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm great, how are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, just, second week in a row, just here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to hang out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Got more coming?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah? You going to be here a while?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was good. It was weaker than the first attempt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, this is my first chance to actually do this to you, and I keep getting completely swarmed by everyone else, so it's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pee pockets? Is that what I heard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I had a good one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam! Let's you and I talk for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Does everyone else need to leave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Do not make us get up right at the beginning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something is pressing into your back, a little painfully. The dream fades, and you try to hold on to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a dick, Laura.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not moving, but they are roped and snaked around your legs. You give a little tug, and you are held in place. And the other thing you see are two sleeping little kids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. That's nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're in the same predicament. There's little tiny miniature vines, almost, whitish color, coming out of the center of this reddish-brown plant holding them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they my kids?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not your kids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fuck them, they can die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. They're not my kids.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First of all, I appreciate you making this all about me, as it should be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Number one on the call sheet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to stand up. Is that a thing I can try to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's it feel, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing good! Keep going!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do there, buddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I sit up in my weird four-poster?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are able to sit up. Your legs can't move, but you sit up, and the pain finally-- whatever was poking you in the back is not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm looking, what was poking me in the back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, there's a really small canine skeleton.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Bixby! Did he have a collar or anything that I could identify?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the bone is bleached white.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it about the same size as little Bix?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pug-sized?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Liam O'Brien killed a pug! [no audio]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are the children from me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a girl and a boy. The girl looks, I don't know, ten or 11. The boy's younger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they asleep? Do they look like they're alive and asleep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're breathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to stir one of them, whoever's closest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's closer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're both equidistant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The older one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The girl, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Laura, you feel like a poke, poke, poke at your legs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew it! Ow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your eyes flutter awake, and you see a really fucking bizarre jungle and some little kid poking at your foot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I'm a kid? (whispers) Oh, we're kids! Muppet Babies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) Crit Role Babies, it's time to play some shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The little blond angelic boy sleeps peacefully as you guys whisper to each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a little blond boy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, who are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Sam!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know each other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just fought dead Conan O'Brien.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I recognize her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kind of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel! TV's Sam Riegel!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, you're a kid! What are you talking about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're that kid from Les Mis! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your face is smaller but your teeth are the same size! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Laura!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're too fat to be Laura! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, you're stirred awake by the sound of children's voices arguing over your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You dick. Wait, who is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's that kid from that commercial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I saw him in Mr. Mom. He looks the same.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He does, if either of you have seen Mr Mom, he does look precisely like he did in Mr. Mom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's basically Butters Stotch. I'm screwed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You totally were!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were Butters Stotch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're figuring that out now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just for your benefit, and for the audience, we're going to be hearing all of the usual Taliesin verbiage and sayings, like "okay" and "this is going to be fun," except please imagine it in a small, piping widdle voice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I have a moment to myself? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's still Executive Goth. He's just seven-ish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're children! What the fuck happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were just fighting Conan, we beat him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sam?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, hi. I know, my teeth are really big. I haven't gotten any work done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Laura!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's everybody else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! Where's Bixby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull out the skull. Huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's too big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's a kid!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! Little hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, bring it back up! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, how old are we? We don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know. You're older than both of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yeah, I am. I'm so in charge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think the dog died, when we got younger somehow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so weird. Where's Travis? (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh gosh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, what if he's still an adult? This is so weird! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys don't see anything. You are, again-- you saw this, and you guys are just coming to and noticing your surroundings. You're in this square, which doesn't make sense, because you're in the jungle, right? But you're in this square canopy plant room, almost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How the fuck do we get out of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, hold my hand, and we'll pull each other and try to pull each other up and out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm grabbing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll all make a weird kid triangle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And try to pull towards each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody make a strength check with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what do we add to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got an 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! I'm so much older than them. I got an 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a two-- ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A two ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A ten. Okay. All right. Well, the little blond kid, barely able to rip any of the plant away from his feet, but this bigger kid grabs you both and pulls both of you out, and it just rips away. It's not too bad, with you guys working together. And now you're standing, the three of you, in a little circle, standing in this little chapel in the jungle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to look for our friends and figure out what the hell's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And last thing I remember, we were doing a voiceover session and all hell broke loose, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we fought him, and we killed him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you almost killed Travis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He cut my arm off!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Travis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The air around you hits you with another (whump), and you feel your skin and bones kind of shake a little bit, and your stomach just feels like it drops. The feeling passes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I let go of her hand, because girls are icky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that a time shift? Did we just shift through time? Are we older?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looking around, we're still in that cube, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, again, you can see out. These metal beams going up that lead to nothing, and are just sort of mangled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, give me a boost, I'm going to climb up the beam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to climb up the beam, because it's covered in vines, right? I can grab on to something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to try to climb up to the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we'll help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add anything to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Add two. I'm making that up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It takes you, like, a minute? You don't want to fall down, you don't want to cut yourself on this rusty beam. You make your way up, and you grab onto the twisted top of this beam. It's all caked over with plant, and a little bit of mud, even, but you can see where there used to be bolts, sort of sprung open on the top. And you pull yourself up and over. No, that's better. And you can finally see out and over and the jungle stretches out in every direction. You can see here and there, on other trees-- and when I say trees, the trees are more brown and red than anything, and they're wet, and they have sort of a bulging sausage feel to them? And they do have leaves, but the leaves are, again, mottled brown and red. And the whole jungle you're in, sunlight does come down and in, but it's pretty dim overall, and everything is tinted with that color. And you see these lumps of hardened, what look like-- they don't have the texture of coconuts. They have the texture of a chestnut, maybe. But they're just growing out of spots on trees. Some are hanging from a vine on different trees. And you can't see where to go. Everything looks the same in different directions, although it is more open from this view, because down below, between these four beams, it's all wrapped around. And you see two little kids going like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I don't see any other sign of life?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Add a Laura Bailey plus three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wow. Yeah. About a hundred feet that way, you see another opened plant on the ground. It's obscured by a tree, but you can see it behind the tree. And you see a jean leg and a sneaker, and it looks bent badly and bloodied. And then you see another leg with a shoe, poking out the other side of the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Well, I climb down and I say, I saw a body, and we should go find it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Contention point, are we wearing kid clothes? Are we wearing kid clothes or tiny versions of our old clothes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're wearing clothes that seems to fit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Just checking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kind of curious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait! We don't know anything about where we are, so we should look and stealth, maybe? And sneak over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So as not to awaken a beast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we should get over there quickly, because that's Travis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Oh, you know? Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It should be. I think it's Travis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.text: I immediately grab his wrist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wake up, there's a lot going on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who the fuck? What is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Mom. You know exactly who I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you're from my future!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm really confused. Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a teenager.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (brokenly) No! Not again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last thing you remember is falling asleep, resting your head on your keyboard in your office at Geek and Sundry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listening to Moana.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome. What? Who? Huh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I point at the Hawaiian shirt and Travis. Are you pulling by this point? There's a lot going on. I don't know. Help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Asleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's glasses Matt! Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he have any facial hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What age is this, about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so yeah, glasses, nearing a mullet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, nearing mullets phase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it looks like a Hawaiian shirt. It's more like a bowling shirt with a cool-looking anime dragon on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dragon Ball Z bowling shirt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! So cute! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's straight up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam, that's so solid!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marisha's a badass bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know exactly what picture they used for this!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in Kentucky at this phase!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, yeah. Aw, Hawaiian shirt Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's about as accurate as you'll ever get.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taliesin!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why didn't we know each other as kids?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look like a Ralph Bakshi cartoon!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so cute!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just not sure of anything! My mom gave me this shirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple of minutes pass and the rest of you catch up. You two are still-- your feet are glued into this plant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fists, bra?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're glued into place and you're sizing each other up and you can tell fairly quickly-- you don't know how old everyone is, but who the oldest is, who the youngest is. Marisha is taller than anyone here, clearly mid-to-late teens. Under her, maybe Ashley, Laura and Matt kind of in the same zone. It's hard to say between Sam and Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was a tiny child. I was a tiny, tiny child.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were theater children.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also was very small.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, eight, nine-ish? Maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, ish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are all the girls more developed? Is this indicative of puberty? Is this a statement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our mental state?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Art is open to interpretation, Marisha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm down two hit points! I've only got eight hit points!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not anymore. Oh, now you do. From ten to eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, I had eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You had eight and now you're at six?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Better be careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez Louise, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys are in the middle of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many hit points do I have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got, let's say nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because you're so tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You have a high constitution.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I've always been a little tough as fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway. Guys, you are in the middle of a very alien jungle. You don't know where the fuck you are, you don't know what is going on, you don't know why you are children. What are you going to do? Are you going to build a house and live here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess so. Wait, are we together again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we catch up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, everyone is here. Is Matt sleeping?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is he not alive?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not out of the flower yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm still inside the flower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right. Okay. I'll go over and be like, yo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh? What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're kids!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is real!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see your glasses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, apparently three Monster energy drinks are not enough to keep you awake working on the campaign book and you pass out on your desktop at home. That's the last thing you remember. And you were tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'm taking my glasses off, I'm like, okay, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can still see!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to keep-- and I look down, am I still in this giant Audrey II-type plant?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can sit up, that's about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh jeez! (yells)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try to pull the flower back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, you can pull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and Ashley (straining noises).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, make a strength check at advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, just you. Because you're pushing to--

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Just Matt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She got a ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Different universe! Different one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. You explode out of this motherfucker like Superman and jump and land on your feet in the middle of the muck, full of adrenaline, and you have no idea what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the coolest thing I ever did at this age, guys. I'm glad you were here to witness it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I really don't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something's going on. We're in a weird forest swamp. There are weird demon dogs that are attacking us--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a cat!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Naked and hairless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was hairless. Oh, Ashley's got it, still.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's on my belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's skinless. That's skinless!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Look around, we're in giant fucking plants. We're fucked!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, everyone's freaking out and Travis has reverted back to his behavior as a 15-year-old or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis has been mentally brought back to that age as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a coping mechanism.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spent far too long roleplaying as Grog, and it's starting to rub off onto him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything's dangerous! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what's really cool about this, though? Okay, I'm going to try to explain this, what's happening in my brain, but right now --

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, it's 420. We're cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we're with it. Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We all have friends right now. Because in real life, when I was this age, I didn't have friends. And now, look, we all have friends!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit! Guys, why didn't we know each other when we were all this age?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we lived in different states.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A few of us were working all the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I was on Broadway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't have friends. I helped people with homework and then they said thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So nice of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was covering for friends' drug habits, so that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was melting action figures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Odyssey of the Mind!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhere in the distance you hear (angry cat noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More cats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a sun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is. Definitely, right where you are, because again the trees opened up, the sky's a little dimmer than you're used to. It's got sort of a dusk feel to it. It's darker, but it's day-ish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did they get in here? How did you get in here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anybody remember anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody see anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, we were fighting Conan O'Brien and then we got pushed forward in time. That's all I remember. And also, Travis tried to kill me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we got pushed forward in time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pushed in time? You guys were there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We came from the future, though, right? DM?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we saw you, you were there! You rode in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You came from the Geek and Sundry offices.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We saw you, you rode in on this sweet Harley and you looked like you were from the Mad Max time period and you were all badass. Not like you look right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, super badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it sounds within the realm of something I'd do, but I don't have any--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have a motorcycle parked behind the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't remember that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt actually said I wasn't allowed to have a motorcycle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I did say that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's afraid I might kill myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you will, statistically speaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's why I said no! She's supposed to live a long time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did we actually get together for dinner? And then we just took drugs for some reason?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were recording and then we fought Conan O'Brien--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys! Scary creature animal sound--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need weapons, we need somewhere to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see anything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The rock seemed to do well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was that booming sound earlier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can I search around? I want to see if there's anything that could be possibly used as a weapon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you sound like that at that age? Were you always--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What, an obnoxious annoying kid? Yeah, totally!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no shortage of vines and trees and rocks. If anyone wants to look for something, if you want to break it off a tree, they'll be stronger if you break it right off a tree probably, but they're around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and break off a sweet staff from a tree branch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they're wet and taut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turgid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Turgid, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to break off a few sticks and try to turn them into sharp daggery sword things. That's fine, I'll be covered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You, Marisha, as you tear down a huge chunk, are just Carrie'd. Just (squishing noise) as you rip it off. When you break, whatever sap or whatever it is that's in there feels hot and is dark red and it spatters you. So you are now blooded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it smell like blood?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it blood? Yeah, I'm going to smell it and do a little bit of a taste test.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to make a nature check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what I do? I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, why not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not a druid in this life!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you know how druids work, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, right? 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you have cut yourself in the past, you have sucked on a cut, and it does taste kind of like that. It is warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it blood?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's warm. It tastes like bad soup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What if everybody else we've ever known was turned into a tree and we're in a jungle pulling their fingers off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the direction that you guys have come from, you hear (fluttering noises).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. I'm going to just grab a handful of rocks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to grab Taliesin and wield him as a weapon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go with it, and I have the stick, I'm just going to be like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hide behind the flower that Matt came out of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you guys are all finding hiding places?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're hiding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't until everyone else starts--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's getting closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's multiple locations, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I climb the tree that I broke off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage because it's sopping wet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you slide and fall right back down and smack your head on a rock and you take one hit point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I immediately drop Taliesin and rush over to make sure she's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, don't! I'm fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Taliesin, you take one hit point of damage as you hit your head on a rock on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hide in a creek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like when I was 12, I can't do anything right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, don't try to fix it! Just don't try to fix it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is six, seven-- you're hiding? Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hiding, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're really enjoying this way too much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is about what I could get hired to play at that age.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you sneak behind, you rogue, you, you sneak behind the giant plant and get right underneath the leaf again, and you reach out and grab Taliesin and yank him with you. And Sam says, "Wait, what about me?" just as these things go (exploding noise) and break out of the tree cover, and there are six or seven of these little ropy skinless cats, running at you at full speed, crossing the water. They're coming. Standing our ground?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Running like the wind, like Forrest Gump coming out of them leg braces!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, from your hiding point, you see Travis just book it in the same direction as the weird old man went, running off through the tree cover, he's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he starts running, can I use Friends to try and ask him to not leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you have spells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a bard!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can really implore him to stay, which means yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to go ahead-- actually, I don't have time, since he's going to bolt. Instead I'm just going to go ahead and use a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll try and persuade him. So I say, Travis don't go, please! You leave now, we all die! We need you! Now's the time to become the man you eventually will be!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Siri, what would we he roll against this? Wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be my persuasion--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wisdom, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really up to you. If he wants to resist it, then yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's just go fast and say wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cannot leave them alone to die. Everybody roll for initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's crazy! I'm sitting in Taliesin's seat. I just realized!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, who got 15 to 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, are we rolling initiative?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got distracted, sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19. Damn, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because of negative one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, ten to 15?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Laura, Travis, Ashley, where you at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, these things are-- here we go. Tree cover! Travis, little boy Travis, has run that far. Are we on camera, guys? We've got Laura and Taliesin-- yeah, that's right. Hidden. Not hidden. Standing their ground. It's got to be this way. Oh, I got it backwards! There we go. And here they come, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) This is just like how I do it with my kids! And you are kids!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, there's so many of them, we're all going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Marisha. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's me up first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is she?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha's right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're not color-coded, so I'll have to help out a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to turn and I'm going to look at everybody else, and be like, we're fucking up these cats, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! And then I'm going to run forward to the one that's closest to me there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, four, five, six, that's where you're at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it? That's all I got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And then I'm going to be like, argh! (crying noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All righty, you're an angry teen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm angry, all hormonal rage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your action and your bonus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have anything I can do, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, as a monk, you should be able to use--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At level one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level one--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have unarmed strike as a bonus action, but that's all that's on my sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Oh, I'm sorry, yeah. You can still use an action if you wanted to go into your dodge action, which any attacks against you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No DMing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm helping out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, man, I'm not complaining! Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone can use their action to make a dodge action, so instead of attacking, you basically just get really defensive, and then attacks against you have disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're just getting ready for it. That's a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sure. I'm super ready for these cats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. D for dodge! Matt, what would you like to do? You're right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to cast 5th-level Explode Cats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to move ahead, and start getting closer to back up Marisha. But I'm going to move a little bit behind her because she's tougher than I am. And that one that's kind of off to the right, that one right there, I look over as I approach and be like: Hey cat! Have you seen the kind of shit she can do? Oh look, your friend over there, he went ahead and fell down already. He was twice as big as you! You're going to die in a second, fool! I was going to use Vicious Mockery on that guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, let's see. Has to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not on my sheet. But that would be, with the math there-- proficiency bonus of plus two, plus my charisma which is three, so the DC would be 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, fuck you, 'cause he got a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. That happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm like, mocking cats is a bad idea. Save me! Can I use the rest of my movement to stand directly behind Marisha?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll give you one more. Taliesin, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peek around and see all this and take a look at what's going down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the one that's closest to Matt and Marisha? I have some vague memories of where we just came from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if any of this still works?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have any of that weird--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you a haunted kid, is that what you're asking me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I was already--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to reach down into the ground, and see if I can just-- I'm just going to try and reach out at that first cat and see if I can hit it with a little bit of the Chill Touch. I want to see if I can make those tendrils form again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Talk to me, Goose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chill Touch on the closest cat to the two kids.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this one right here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is definitely within range of your goth attitude. Okay! So you've got to make a ranged spell attack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't actually know how to do this anymore. Where's my spell--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus five, just roll plus five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 does in fact hit, so you slam your little tiny cherub hand into the ground and it sinks into the mud, and you feel the dark power of your overlord slide down into the ground, and a split-second happens, and it goes (electric sound) out of the ground, underneath this thing, and tendrils, spectral purplish-black tendrils wrap around it and yank it into the ground! And it is fucking gone! (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (heavy breathing) Cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of you motherfuckers can do what Taliesin just did. Sam, you're up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Which one am I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are in the luchador pants, right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I go forward and to the left. Am I within throwing range?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For throwing a rock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I can hold my action until they get in range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, you want to wait until one gets close enough, and then chuck a rock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will get ready. I'll cock my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cock a rock. Cock rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cock rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Ashley. You're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to take the dead skinned cat from my belt and hold it by the tail, and say, (shouting) All right, you motherfuckers! You better turn around and leave or I'm going to kill every last motherfucking one of you! I'm going to intimidate them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Intimidate, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're cats.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (shouting) I don't care if they're just cats!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an intimidation check at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is absolutely brilliant. Ooh! You're rolling good tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a disadvantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because it's a herd of skinless--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm fucking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scary! She's really intimidating!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a little standoff, there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. She rolled higher on the second one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cats growling) They start backing up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slowly. The first three do. The first three do stop in their tracks. The other three-- well you'll find out in a minute. Laura, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my attack until one of them comes closer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how are you going to attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have those two sharpened sticks like daggers, yo!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they melee sticks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I suppose so, because I don't know how to make a throwing stick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's just called a stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want it to be sharp, I don't want to just throw a stick at something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Are you waiting until they're in throwing range or until they're right up on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want to wait until--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm under a leaf. We're hiding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not going to get near you in the next round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a hundred feet away from them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fine, I'll run out there and back up Ashley. I'll go stand next to Ashley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30, 40, bust out-- okay, right there, boom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And wait until they get closer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Travis, would you like to keep--- oh no, you were convinced to run. Do you want to stay hiding here? Or do you want to go back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, I'll go back. I was convinced.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been shamed by Sam to come out of fucking hiding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, just direct line back? And you can dash, too, I mean you're way far back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've only got six health points right now, bro.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to dash?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'm going to use my action to reach in and grab what is definitely all-white tighty-whiteys, and I'm going to rip the elastic band off of my briefs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to pull the elastic band off and prepare to, I don't know. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To strangle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, to strangle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chances are so small, but I want you to roll just in case you get a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those tighty-whiteys rip out of your hands and you crouch down, and you've got like a piano wire, except it's your underwear. And you're ready. Okay. So these three don't leave, but they back up to about here. They're still barely past the edge of the tree. These ones are still coming, they didn't give a shit. One, two, three, four, five, six, and he's going to dash and get right up on you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that within throwing range for me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm throwing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, throw! Make a ranged attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, do I hit Marisha, or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do, actually. It conks off the back of your head--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll a d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three? What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Oh, one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are clocked hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it! Dick!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a musical theater person!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My mom warned me about people like you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are just going for the closest victim they can find, but they're not close enough to actually attack. They make it up to there, they are rounding on Marisha, and now it's Marisha's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, so I've got two kitty cats on me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three kitty cats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really mean, Marisha! They have claws!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh! What? This is why you spay and neuter your pets! And then I kick the one directly in front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get a multiattack as a monk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get two attacks as a monk, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get two? Okay, I'm going to kick the first one, just full on punt him, then I'm going to take the stick with the second one and give him a big old golf swing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, roll two attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See what's the first one, in case you kill it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one? That's not great. 14 for the first one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the kick? Roll a d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One plus three. Four points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, your foot takes this thing under the chin and you just slick the bottom of your shoe and you feel a snap in your foot and it just does a spin in the air and lands on its back, dead. But you're still moving and smacking the next one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Golf swing! Which is-- ooh, that's good, that's 15 plus-- 21.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely hits. d4 plus strength.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five, total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and you swing away and go crack and this time you hit the thing's fucking head so hard that you hear the same kind of snap, except you feel tendon rip at the same time, and the head goes free except for this thin little band of ligament, and it just falls and is still twitching and going (whimpering noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first hit, behind her I go, nice! Second one I go, no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel guilty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, you're up. And you've got a direct view of blood dripping out the back of your young fiancée's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that's right. Well, there's the one still next to her. All right, you know what, I'm going to go ahead and say: Don't worry, baby, I'll take care of you! In about ten years! Or right now. We'll do that now! Healing Word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bonus action, so you heal five hit points.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh, the back of your head stops smarting like Advil, pronto, all healed up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, you're so calming, just your presence. So good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In ten years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I look over at the cat. As she's saying this, the cat is in front of her going (snarling noise). Okay, we're dead!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cat yowling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to walk up and try and do what she did, try and kick at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kick it? Okay, go for a roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I move up base to base, right against her shoulder, and just, (screams). Screaming, probably think I'm going to hurt myself more than the creature, trying. And that is a four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do the most beautiful martial arts movie spin kick that hits absolutely nothing, and come back down and breathe heavy (panting) and look over at the love of your life. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm proud of myself, because that looks just like it does when I practice it when I'm home alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Executive, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see this one that's threatening. I'm going to try and get a little more fancy with this. I'm just going to see if I can manifest the power inside the cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Inside the cat? Sure, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Shooting, going for inside the cat. It's already gross. That's right, I've got to learn this. 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so as Matt's foot comes down into the water and goes (panting) you're right face-to-face with the thing. Its feral face is leaning up against yours and it goes (yowls) and then three spectral octopus tentacles come out of its face, one out of each eye and one of its mouth, and you feel that shit just slathering all over your face and sucks back in and the thing just explodes like a blood sausage. Gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When I turn around and see this tiny bowl haircut blond kid from the Omen just glowing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look over your shoulder and you just see that face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, who are we fighting? I don't know who we're fighting anymore!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're good, we got this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's Taliesin!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my turn? Oh, it's my turn again. We've cycled around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Are those guys out of range?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just, but you could get in range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to try to right my wrongs and get in range and throw another rock at the middle one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The middle one? Okay. Looks good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to use the rest of your movement? You could back up a little bit, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Is there anything I can hide behind? Is that a thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the closest cover of any kind is 50 feet away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And they're going to get me. I'll just go huddle with Marisha and Matt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay, there you are, a little chorus line. Ashley, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll walk up alongside the four of them, just swinging the corpse. It's your call! You want to run, or you want to keep fighting? Four of you down! Five, actually! Math wasn't my strong suit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, you're watching rebel teen Ashley mouth off at some skinless cats. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand, walk around them--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To this side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but back. Just stay behind them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I ready my sticks, and I'm going to save my action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. You can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stick! Stick! Stick!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Travis. What's up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my dash to try and join the other crew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, look at that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Awkward. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sweat just pouring down his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (heavy breathing) My asthma is a problem at this point. My Ventolin inhaler is broken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are straight-up the kids from It right now, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. (bell ding) The three cats continue to-- well, they don't bristle, because they have no hair. They're still backing up. They move backward into the tree cover, but you see them stop. They don't flee. They get into the trees and they sit and stare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably get out of here before more cats come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think they did that because something bigger's coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they did it because Ashley's fucking scary as shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was an old man when we got here before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're really cool, Ashley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that was pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ashley and I just, football, huh! Huh! And then we do the chest bump thing in the air. Huh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And whatever this stuff is goes (squishing) between you.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which me, being two feet away, (splashing noise). That's still pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We saw an old guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we saw an old man, he was trying to peel you out of the tomato plant you were in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which way did he go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He went that way. That way, now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can anybody track?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go! I'm pretty good at that, at tracking, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I'm a ranger. Isn't that what rangers do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you're Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it a shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had a treehouse in the woods growing up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's come up so many times today!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, try to find the fucking old guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it was right behind my house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He spent a long time trying to keep away from old guys in the woods, so he knows how to track them well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to give you, if you want to-- do you want to track?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, make a perception, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tracking would be survival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, for reasons, do it at advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you love this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a ranger and rangers get advantage in their favorite terrain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe because he knows you know the old guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because Warner Bros is your favored terrain?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. You see where Verno booked it before. You can see Verno went through the trees right here, but you see another break. You see a vine split off right there, and you gather that he went in generally the same direction, not exactly, where Travis went.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let's go find him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Follow me, everyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So cute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't shower much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody's following Ranger Sam, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right. So.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to clean my perpetually fogging glasses because of the humid weather.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's like every 30 seconds here. So you guys start walking, and after the first minute, you notice as you're going, Sam, in the ground, something very different than anything else you've seen here. There's a long bar in the ground, half sunken into the ground, and covered over. You only saw a glint of yellow, and it was faded over and mucky, but you saw it. It looked very different. Leaning down, you wipe away some of the crap covering it, and you see sort of an alternating yellow, black pattern. It's like a long board. It's old, and it's wet and rotted through, but there's no mistaking one of those things for gate entry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, parking lot entry gate. Wait, does that mean we're in an old overgrown parking lot? I'm going to dig it out. Or I'll try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You don't even need to make any kind of a check. Everything is so slick here, it just slides out. You can't lift the whole thing or hold the whole thing because it's eight feet long. As you pull it out, it's so soft, it breaks at one spot, but there's no question what that is. This is exactly a gate entry bar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a wild guess. I'm going to see if there's a little boxhouse nearby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I assist him on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where it would be, physically. I'm getting a sneaky suspicion--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you turn that stick into a weapon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine? 13? Yeah, I mean, you've been to Warner Bros.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We're still on the WB lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those four posts were the tower! What was left of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that even mean? How do we get home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just several miles down the 405 ought to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I say it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to say it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You thought it, you might as well say it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a theory about where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're at Warner Brothers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like we're in the Upside-Down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of life, or WB?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, wait, if these are security booths here, maybe they have some handcuffs or something that we can get in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any working flashlights in the security booth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can make an investigation check. You didn't find anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join you, just rummaging through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it. You're digging through rot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, just 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You dig, and you do find the foundation of-- it's Hollywood Way. It's the exact setup for that little booth when you're going into park, right under the tower. I mean, you haven't traveled that far, right? And there's nothing in here. The bottom of the structure, the walls is there, you can tell where the bottom of the door, the lintel? Is it the lintel? I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, why not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You found the gate post, and that's all you found, there's no--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's no walls in the thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can just barely make out one corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it feel like some of the buildings might still be there, hidden in this forest structure, or is it just too dense?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I backtrack, now that we're slowly piecing this together, see if I can find the Hollywood Way sign? The street sign?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't wander too far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I just want to turn around, if it's right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys here, that way maybe was the tower, about here's where you find the security gate, I guess, and old feller ran that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) We should head towards Geek and Sundry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He went north? Is he going north on Hollywood Way? I rolled a ten total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To find a sign?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hollywood Way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we know the direction. We know where the tower is. We know where the booth is. We just go that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep following the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy was pretty old?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was super old. He was old and weak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You saw a glint of glasses, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He had a glint of glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we keep going, we can probably catch up to him because he's probably not very fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a very smart young man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all I got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't see anything! What if this is just a Warner Bros specific thing? What if the rest of LA is okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we can see into LA and it's not, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's jungle everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you can believe your eyes, San Fernando Valley is this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this the future we're looking at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it everything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got one option: we've got to follow this old guy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's follow the old guy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When you climbed up to the top, you didn't see any structures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, all I saw was jungle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, it's the Valley, there's not a lot of skyscrapers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean it's a jungle here. It's a desert, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's try to go after the old guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not normal trees. They look like engorged sausages.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wet Bulging Sausages. Warner Bros Studios.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Turgid, engorged--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a lot that's going on right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I start getting a nosebleed. Well, if there's any building in this vicinity that lasts through time, it's the Bob's Big Boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are we going to Bob's Big Boy?! Didn't he go north on Hollywood Way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did. If you can believe your eyes, if this nonsense is actually based on anything, then yes, he is heading along Hollywood Way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going down Hollywood Way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, so Ranger Sam leads the way. You guys start traveling. It's slow-going because it's wet and disgusting and there's trees everywhere. You're going through fucking swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we go, we should keep our eyes out for anything that we can use as weapons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's lots of vines and rocks and sticks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nothing metal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just Ashley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last metal you saw was Ashley Johnson and what is presumably the base of the Warner Bros water tower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I start trying to fashion a slingshot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Out of cat gut?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Out of a nice little twig. Travis can attest I'm pretty good with slingshots.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a seven, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's Ashley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 11? Okay. So, what you're able to do as you're walking is to pull and rip away some of the leg tendon from this thing's body. And now you've got this stretchy piece of meat to work with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispering) That's so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More on that later. You guys continue to walk through the jungle and you're noticing that the ground is moving downward a bit now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you heal me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw you heal Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty spent right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, do me a favor and make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, I'm leading this party. Focus on me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to close up my wounds that I got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not a one or a two? Through a gap between three trees, way in the distance, you see a balding, white-haired little old man. And he sees you seeing him, and he's gone again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! I saw him! Guys, he's that way! We should go that way, but maybe flank, right? I played paintball as a kid, so we can flank.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are a kid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come at him from two directions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're running?

lines.name: TRAVIS
