lines.text: I'm booking ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow! Travis is just running today!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ran everywhere! I was fast as shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm running after Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My ADHD was in overdrive all the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you have the mind of a current-day Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm fast again, y'all!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is everybody following suit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm following Travis!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I'm flanking! I'm flanking around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're flanking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I follow Riegel and I say, why are we running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I follow Marisha because she's the biggest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I follow Travis.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Are you with this group? The flanking or the straight-on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Straight-on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys start booking through and trying to stay up. You're slipping as you go, but managing to catch up. And he is old. You're getting closer to the spot where you saw him, Sam. And you're looking over, you're playing the raptor; maybe you can catch him from the side. You guys are still going down. All of you are going down and then ahead. You notice that you guys are in separate wedges of a hill that are both leading now to the same place. And you see this guy again, and he scuttles over a little ridge and down. He scuttles up over a little bit of ridge of plant and mud, and then he disappears from view. And it's almost like you're looking at-- it's so thick here, the trees are so thick that you can probably get through on the sides, but there's one big main entrance here that is scooped up in like an upside-down U of plant growth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One way in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's start running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's charging after him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going in together, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go run into the funnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you see a one, you see a four. And then you're past it, and everybody's running. And this old man is maybe a hundred feet ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we yell out to him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! Stop running, what the fuck. We're just trying to figure out what's happening!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're just kids!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He does stop, and spins around. He's still pretty far away from you, and he looks (breathes heavily).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (breathes heavily) And he spins and he continues to run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you hear, at that moment, the sound of a war horn? Massive. It feels like the inside of your head, your skull, is vibrating like a bell. Your teeth are shaking. Your eyes feel like they are expanding in their sockets, and you feel (explosion noise), and everything changes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Inception.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, are we going deeper? No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything grows darker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're standing in miserably frigid cold water swirling around your legs and your waist. And you're staring out at the horizon, and the sky-- it's so jarring, it's so different than where you were. You're staring out at dark clouds above you and over the horizon. And that horn that is blasting finally quits, and you just hear the sound of the surf. Of waves crashing on a beach. A beach behind you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any footprints on the beach leading from the water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A vast horde of writhing, malignant nightmares stand watching you. All shapes and sizes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Casting directors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Black, oiled, insect-like flesh. White chalky corpse-like figures. Literal devils.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Commercial casting directors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A long tongue slathering back and forth across its enormous teeth. Hungering. The horn of the apocalypse tears the air again, rattling your brains in your little skulls as the legion before you begins to jibber and shriek. Everyone roll for initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's everything we've ever faced.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. We're going to die!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brought to you by the producers of Independence Day!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For real!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, even-- (laughs) So. Do I know what this is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the producers of 2012!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Me as Matt Mercer, even at 12, Matt Mercer-- (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Matt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I get a little more juice on the audio, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for healing me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's roll for initiative, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, great. That's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As, as we roll, I look down to see if-- Are we any older, or are we the same age?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same age.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same age?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I check if I've got pubes. Do I have pubes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Nair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody there? 15 to 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17, 15? Laura, Marisha. Okay, ten to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten. Okay. I got Travis, Ashley, and Matt left. What have you guys got?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are these things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that big thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I think we can take them, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can anybody make a boat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a really big thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura Bailey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. That's important, isn't it? You're in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys know in Stranger Things, that the big monster they keep talking about?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The demogorgon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The demogorgon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what that is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we can take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. They won't come into the water. Maybe we just stay here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gremlins can go in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That just makes more of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's no good answer here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, how do you kill these things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't tell you. My initiative's four. Go! I'm too scared. In fact, if we weren't halfway in the ocean, you would see the soak marks on the front of my jeans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And in fact, around Matt, the water is quite warm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better than a chlorinated pool, man

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) A chlorinated pool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'd be a little green.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have nothing. I'm just going to back up further into the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It is rough going. You can go about 15 feet as you push your way back. Now you're moving backward in the water, and the water's now up to your childlike collarbone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hold my breath and put it under the water and see what I can see under the water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as you do, you see a very thick serpent swim past your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! Bubbles! (laughs) I come back up out of the water. We're surrounded! There's something in the water!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: (scream)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go. Have no fear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well, I fucking hate the cold above all things! Which is a hundred percent true, so I'm going to fuck this ice-water shit, and start heading out towards the beach, just because that would be my first concern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You are now standing on the beach, looking at a legion from hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, Yeah! What's up?! This is the party at the end of the world, right? And I just start dancing. Hey! And I cry a little. Oh! Hey! Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The giant continues to judge you. On your sides, there are two very large-- not as big as the big guy, obviously, but two winged, twice the size of you guys, bent over muscular ropey winged creatures, and they just stand there going (raspy breaths) here and here. Taliesin, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join Marisha on the beach because I hate the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I remembered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's cold. And this has kind of happened to me before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whole monster thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, this is true, I'm going to say what I said last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mister Satan dude, we are totally ready to serve you! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is literally what I said last time this happened. Oh boy, that's not great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But there are fish in the ocean, Taliesin!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I got out. Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight? Noted. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my full action until something happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, until what happens?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until they start moving within ten feet of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, got it. Sam, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to also join them on the beach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And similarly, I'm going to hold up the skull of Bixby and say: We serve the darkness as you do! We will do your bidding if you will let us! Please spare our lives so that we may serve yours!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, noted. Ashley, what would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're Ozzy Osbourne and shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could have so hung out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does that count?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what you rolled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, noted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. Gigantic feet crunch down in the sand as he slowly walks forward, or they do, and one head stares at you, little man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A strength check. That's a nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Travis, you feel your whole body lock up as you are lifted out of the water, straight up into the air, and a little bit forward. And your little duder body is just floated forward and you are frozen in terror. You can't move a muscle, and the head on this side is just staring at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little poo falls into the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little rabbit pellet makes it through the shorts. Straight through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been hoarding Cocoa Puffs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, being both a bard and being a kid that both as an adult and in that age spent a lot of free time alone reading monster manuals and cryptozoology books, can I possibly see if I recognize any sort of nature to this creature? Any sort of religious context to it, or any idea where it may have come from?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like the shit you saw in your DND books, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Seeing as how Ashley already seems to be the one that's on the right track, I'm going to begin to step towards the water. Using a bonus action, I'm going to go ahead and give her bardic inspiration and be like, Ashley, continue to prove your savagery! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chew deep and revel in the insanity, as this day, we prove our mettle against the force of darkness!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Chew deep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that even mean, chew deep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With fogged-up glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have much gifts to grant you, and follow you to the ends of this plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not so great. Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One last little squirt comes out of your ding dong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got this, Ashley!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He would like to use one of his legendary actions now. And you see his long, nightmarish tail swing, coil, and then whip out, and strikes down and lands on Marisha and crushes her into the beach and rips away. And you see a smear on the sand. You see a clump of red hair. And some innards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a track mark!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I'm going to just stand back in the water and continue to scream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Noted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams) Get back in the water! Get back! It just killed Marisha! Get back in the water! And then I'm going to try and jump up and see if I can reach Travis's leg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His leg? He's 30 feet in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't reach you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watch out, there's poop down there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I see it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that the end?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just staying. I'm going to stay and just hold my sticks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Off on your left, you see. (splashing noises) It doesn't come all the way. It just watches you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, they hate people who are marketable! That's the key! Be marketable!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is the echo we hear in our minds. We don't hear out loud, as she's nothing but a hairy smear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mr. Mom, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Woobie, woobie, woobie!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not pleased. I am going to start wishing that we had some help with this somehow, and I'm going to start, I suppose, casting Unseen Servant?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to attempt to create something to catch Travis when he lands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And otherwise, I think I'm just staring at the ground for the moment, because that was a lot that just happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Guys, everybody sees a spectral form of a grown Taliesin Jaffe appear next to child Taliesin Jaffe, and floats over floating Verno, and spectral Taliesin just starts going like this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for making that as awkward as humanly possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you're welcome. All done?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, those are tendrils? What are those things, those are just arms?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tendrils.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant arm. Tentacle arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill me. Kill me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With what, a rock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fucking dying up here, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you try and kill him with a rock, you'll kill him, so just go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my movement and my action to dash--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the demogorgon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to try to kill it with love and give it a big hug around its leg and say, I forgive you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You grab it by the leg?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, noted. Ashley, what would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Schmear?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, half her body's gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's fine. Don't know what I'm doing, I was weird as a 15-year-old, so I'm going to walk over to her body, what's left, and get my hands in it. And I'm going to stare him in the eye, and I'm going to smear it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys watch in horror as your friend Ashley, pushed to the brink, crouches down and shoves her hands up into the hollowed-out ribcage of Marisha Ray, pulls her hands down, and slathers it down her face, and suddenly we're in the Lord of the Flies.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is her ribcage free and loose?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loose? I mean, yeah, she's a third of her former weight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to put it over my head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's your whole action. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you're holding me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're wearing her like a scarecrow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley picks up Marisha's broken open chest cavity and head and matches the form of demogorgon somewhat and puts a second head on herself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is like what I want to have happen when I die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're out of juice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Died like she lived.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wear like me a spirit hood! Do it, Ashley, do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's puppeteering you like a Skeksis! You're a Henson puppet!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Demogorgon's turn. Do you want to do anything, Travis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh sure, I just want to fucking run like a rabbit, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you're floating in the air. You want to try to break free of his grip?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. You're going to go with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He takes one step forward with Sam on the leg, going for the ride, and Travis floats forward, right up between the two thing's heads and the angry one on this side goes (growling) and takes the upper half of your body into its mouth and the other one more daintily goes (chomping) and pulls a leg free, and child Travis is ripped in half in front of you, blood raining down on Sam down below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear a really girly scream from inside the one mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But love conquers all!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I've spent the entirety of the last six seconds just staring at the place on the ground where Marisha was crushed. So I haven't really been paying attention. Loosely paying attention to Ashley rummaging through her remains and then wearing them like a wintertime jacket.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But my fists are clenched, they're shaking, the tears are streaming down my face, and whatever plan we had is out the window, and I just rush towards the demogorgon, screaming. (screams) And I'm going to Thunderwave him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! Do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he needs to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we doing anything about Sam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't fucking care about Sam right now, I just want to hurt this thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a child, Matt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it. And it's, what is it, it's constitution? Help me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution. I'm just like, tears down my face, just (screaming).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Sam, make a constitution save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16 plus-- there's no number written there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made it, he succeeds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, so roll for damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 thunder damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you look at these two heads, now looking at you, and their eyes seem to swirl in a miasma of hatred, and you feel your mind just go. Roll a d10, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As my bonus action on my turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I now realise that I accidentally hit Sam, and I'm like, Sam. We have to end this now. Let's do this. And you get an inspiration die, d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. What did you roll on the d10?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're covered in the guts of your friend, Marisha. This is really weird, that thing is a giant! But you've got to fight it, right? Yeah, I'm okay! I'm okay! And you steel yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. She's hardcore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as I see it tear apart Travis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just turn the other way and just start swimming out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll just put you there on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope! Nope, nope, nope!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Triple dash!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You start to swim. You feel a serpent slide past your rib cage as you go, and you freak out as you swim--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my stick and hit it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't do that, because two clawed feet latch into your back and lift you up, out of the water. You are now dangling about 20 feet-- yeah, 20 feet above the water. Here. Just dog paddling to nothing. And that's its turn. And Taliesin, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get the sneaking suspicion that we're screwed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're doing good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, on the ropes, man. On the ropes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is where we turn the tide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's definitely bloodied.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling a little like this might be the end. I'm not feeling pretty good about this, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Walk into the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to flick it off, and the one, the little creature on the right--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Chill Touch. Just going to crush that fucker as just a fuck-you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Make a ranged attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I probably have to roll for damage on that one because he's not tiny. Where's my d8s? Two. That's two points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two points? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a 1d8, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, that's correct. It's 1d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So you plant your hand down into the sand, and you feel that same energy surge out of your palm, and it bursts up under this corpulent little pasty-faced dude, and it reaches up and grabs him by the gut, and pulls away a love handle in tentacle form, down into the ground. And everybody around him just starts going (snarling), and he's just got innards spilling out, going (gravelly dying sounds).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to move my Unseen Servant underneath Laura, just in case, to try and pull her to shore if she goes back down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so your Unseen Servant moves just below Laura, and he uses his legendary action, and the tail whips out and goes (whipping sound), and you watch as two-thirds of Taliesin's child guts are ripped out and he just falls, face forward, down into the sand, and he is dead, and the Unseen Servant vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, what would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm partially naked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hugging a demogorgon. I would like to climb up a little up his leg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And just say: Kill them, but save me. I will fan you and get you food, and whatever. Just kill them all. They're nothing, just save me. Just save me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ashley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll on anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I need to roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you already tried to persuade this dude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Then I got nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Make a persuasion, at disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can add your inspiration dice, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. You probably shouldn't. You should hold off on that. Save it for the next-- oh wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley, what would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your head up here. Listen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She starts with "listen." (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We already know what's going to happen here. We know we're going to die. But, guess what? After this, we go to another world, so you know what? I don't like leading, and I don't like following, you motherfucker! Is my slingshot ready?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you didn't have a chance to get to that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take out a rock out of my pocket, and I'm going to throw it at him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it. Make a ranged attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. What am I doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll a d20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't add anything, do I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not proficient with it

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do the dex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, plus two to whatever you rolled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) A six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The rock bounces off of his belly button-type area.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't care. I did it. I didn't mean for it to actually hurt you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has that much control!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well, the next thing that happens is the double-armed tentacle comes down and wraps around your neck. And you watch as (splitting noise) and you see two heads spin out to the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You killed it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Matt and Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My plan is working; I'm still alive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he doesn't realize you're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like to do, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, staring this thing down, my eyes-- I can't see anything because the water, so I rip the glasses off the front of my face and throw them behind me on the beach and staring up at it I say: I know everything about you. I've seen your pictures, I've read every single aspect of your existence. And here's the fun part: when it all comes down to it, you're just a figment of some fat guy's imagination! Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Legit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, that's-- well, it makes a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, my DC is 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13, okay. You see the angrier one on this side going (growls, huffs, growls louder)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the other head swivels around so they're both looking at you, and they stare into your insecure little 12-year-old soul. Roll a d10, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's a sensitive place. Ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing happens! You hold your own against the demogorgon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) You've played too much DND.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my sticks out and I'm going to try to stab the tentacle that's holding me up in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to make an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add anything? My dex?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, your dex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to break out my grapple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to break out of the grapple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, I'm just going to try to-- no, I'm going to attack the tentacle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, that doesn't do shit because he's got you so firmly grasping in his taloned feet that you can't turn around and get at him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, then I try to break out of the grapple!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, what happened was you tried to get him with a stick and you couldn't turn around. You got a bonus action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what I can do as a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rogue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't disengage; I'm not a high enough level. I'm just a me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Level of Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, level of Laura at 13, 12, or whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You hear a little sizzling sound and you feel the thing's body flex against you, and then you don't even know what happened; there is a noxious fume all around you going into your eyes and your nose. Everything burns; your throat and your nose burn, the insides of your ears burn. I would like you to make a con save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 11!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Your body locks up. You can't move and he lets go. You fall into the water, frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, you'd be caught by my Unseen Servant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that vanished when you died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that vanished when I died!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would suck so bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay, I'm okay, I'm not okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I climb up higher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, how high do you want to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the way up to its ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done. You scrabble up like a little spider monkey all the way up, panicked, climbing up on top. "Hi!" And you're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can sing you show tunes! I know doo-wop songs! I will do your bidding forever if you just let me live!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And your voices stops as the sharp end of his tail splits through the back of your skull and breaks your face open entirely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can work with this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beautiful, beautiful smile. That beautiful smile gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then there was two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rodgers and Hammerstein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll kill you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The demogorgon bends over and looks down at you, Matthew, and somehow, you knew this was the way it would always be. And a giant, ropey foot rises up and you don't see shit. Laura, what would you like to do? Oh, she's not here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, she disappeared.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's where we'll take our break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're dead! End of session.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just talk about it for an hour after we come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had this dream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did have this dream. This is based on a nightmare I had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a terrible one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was real bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did Ashley wear the upper torso of Marisha in your dream?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, none of you were there. It was just me on a godforsaken beach. In my dream, these things, it wasn't demogorgon, it was Revelations, and they were all on shitty wooden scaffolding, stretching in every direction for miles. And I just felt that big and I was like, "Well, this is it." And that was the nightmare.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We laughed. We cried. We died. We'll see you in a few.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, watch the Tabletop promo, it's real good. We're real proud of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this mid-break, this guy? Yeah, sorry, before I forget! Giveaway! I have got a Wyrmwood dice vault made of pink ivory wood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you do!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You wanna get that code word: demogorgon!

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Demogorgon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spell it correctly if you want to win! Demi-gorgon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Demo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Demo-gorgon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This could be yours in hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chat will get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [break]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It won't work this time. Hey guys! Welcome back. So, right off the top, we have been doing this show for hundreds and hundreds of hours, and for the first time ever we have a player going home sick. Laura is tapping out. She probably has got the same thing Brian Foster had. We'll all be next, yay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Especially because we French kiss all the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She'll be there, but not physically on set. What else? So our winner for the dice vault over the break was YassieXD. YassieXD, you now have a lovely box for your dice to put it in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, I'm thrown. I'm thrown, my friend went home. Oh, well. What else do we do now, do I just start? Is that what I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jump right in, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody's dead, so...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're all dead?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good game, good game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the post-mortem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We built Dis post-mortem?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Darkness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quiet. You have no sense of time. Minutes, days, you don't know. A voice barks out, "Okay, "that was really good, let's go right back into another one." Ashley, your eyes flutter open and squint in the glare of bright white light from all sides. They adjust. "Guys, we good? I wanna go "right into another." You look around. You're lying in a large white room. The walls are padded with soft cloth material.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley, you sit up--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is my nightmare!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Neil, with his glorious beard, walks up, but calls out over his shoulder, says, "Liam, I'm "sorry, don't get too comfortable, we're going to move on to your scene pretty soon. Don't pass out "on me." And you see over on the lounge-y area, a pair of shoes lying off the side of a couch, and you hear a dorky voice say, "Got it. Okay." "Ashley, Ashley, can I grab a word over here?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Yes, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's ahead of you, though, by like 20 feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You walk over and you see he's doing that thing where he's standing on the outside of his feet, looking down. When he senses that you've walked up, he says, "Question. For the first line "of this scene, what are you feeling right now?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm feeling... confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A little... I think I just need... How are you feeling about it? Like, what are you feeling-- what is missing? What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me just interject as the Dungeon Master and let you know that he is not showing any recognition that you are 14 at all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
