lines.text: It hurts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any way to break off the arm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, you can hit that motherfucker.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. I'm gonna use my mocap knife.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Those are actually pretty strong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Masking tape and 'Ashley' written on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if it's like the hardcover cast stuff, then yeah, that could actually be substantial.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be a piece of plywood, it's hard to say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get advantage because it's mine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but you can add your proficiency bonus 'cause you're a rogue, and it's a dagger, and your-- I'm gonna say strength here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I would add both of those?

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, girl. It's rubber. It just bends to the side as soon as you stab it down. Matt? Oh yeah, do you wanna do anything else, do you wanna pull away?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I'm just gonna ask-- yeah, 'cause I can't attack again, obviously. I'm gonna ask the big thing, talk to me, what do you want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On that broken piece of screen down the side, you see the lower half, you can make it out, it's fragmented but you can see most of the word 'FORGIVE M--' And it's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I got a 'NO', you got--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'SAM'.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'SAM'. And then he said 'FORGIVE'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'FORGIVE M--'

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'FORGIVE M--'

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For killing people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 'FORGIVE M--' or 'FORGIVENESS'?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a 'NO', he got a 'SAM', you got a 'FORGIVE M--'

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like to do, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I used all my spells in the previous battles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before this performance-capture stage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You still feel-- you feel magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does everything reset?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, that changes things. Well, first, I'm gonna go ahead and say, it's all right, Ashley, you've spent a lot of time in this volume before, you're still the queen of it. So I'll give you a Healing Word with my bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's a five, you heal five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yay! Thanks, Matt. So clutch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm gonna go ahead... so the leg that broke off? I'm gonna go ahead and rush over to pick it up, and like a giant metal baseball bat, swing back and try and hit back at it with its own leg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you are. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this at disadvantage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not proficient--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah. You're-- nah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we'll say-- that's a 19? Natural.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two for strength.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clocked that motherfucker. Roll a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a two plus two. Four damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You break off-- you were trying to break off a leg, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to hit one of the other legs, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It breaks. It smashes, and the thing lurches down to the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not going for the core, I'm just going for its means of attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, right, right. And it falls right in front of you, and now the little camcorder-sized screen falls right in front of your face, and you see 'FORGIVE ME'. Gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha, what would you like to do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of my turn, I shout, just 'cause I'm really curious, let's not kill it yet, but definitely disable it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Noted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha is up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Matt, and I say, don't kill it? 'Kay. And then I look for its memory card. It's gotta have-- I'm thinking my production elements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, right, logic, I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's gotta have a memory card somewhere in there. How many gigs does it have? It's hard to say. But if I immediately remove it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Make an investigation check to find its memory card.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus fucking christ, all right. Oh my god, that's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the Snitch? Well, on your Snitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See? Look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's an actual natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You see on the bottom of it, like a fucking outie belly button, a cylinder, and on the end of the cylinder's a slot, and it says right above it, 'SD'.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like output? Is it output? And I'm just gonna go click. And see if it pulls out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't... it doesn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? No pulling out of the SD card?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you press it and-- I mean, it's going (whirring sound) while you're doing this, you definitely found something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not connected to the cloud! They don't have a backup drive!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just wondering if the memory card--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you did spend six seconds finding that thing. And--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does have a backup drive. It does not matter, though. That's the important part, is that no one cares that we have a backup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a split-second, in your peripheral vision, you see a light blink, but it's gone. You didn't see what it said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These people have very poor cloud storage. That's all you need to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura tries to get in front of Neil, and she starts pulling on wires coming out of the thing's head, and she yanks, but she's pulling, and it's not doing anything. She's really little. Really cute. She's so small, and the wires are not coming free, but she's trying, she's trying to save Neil Druckmann. Sam, what do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I mean, I don't really know what these symbols and messages mean, so like the piece of scaffolding that fell down like this, can I run and sort of jump on it and do it again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Four. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just hit it and you slide down to the bottom of it, and wish that you hadn't decided to do what you just did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll spend the rest of my action/bonus or whatever looking at those screens to see if they say anything to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it does, briefly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'HUSBAND'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'HUSBAND'?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) It's Liam. It's Liam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're not filming in 4K, it's fine, just go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Without breaking eye contact with Marisha, I send another tendril at the one that won't stay down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Ranged attack. The prince of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The tentacle does a great big display and spirals around, and you look fucking fierce and it matches the color of your hair. No it doesn't. No it doesn't!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't match the color of my hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It matches the color of your in-person hair right now. There we go. But it doesn't reach. It falls short. We see a lot of rage and fury, but no delivery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. And I'm going to back off a bit, and I'm gonna also keep looking at those screens to see if they say anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No? No. Not right now. Not in that split-second. Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach up to my mocap helmet and wrench the little GoPro camera that's surrounded by LED lights.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes you can!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I wrench it off and can I face it towards it, go, backfeed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're using it like a talisman?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know, like little fucking Hobbits, like you know, little Bilbo did, using the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The LED light that's always in our face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll tell you what, I will not give you advantage, but I will give you a DM inspiration die of a d6 to make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Okay. Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus a d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry, sorry. 21. Oh, I won't spend it now. 21. 19 plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The thing lurches backwards for a bit, and as it backs away from you, pulling away from that metal, you see on the screen it says, 'TRAVIS, NO'. And that disappears and it backs away, pulling, dragging cords out of that hole. It can't really get too far, because it's now you see that it is connected down, it was sort of squatting, hiding a lot of that shit because of the carnage underneath it, but it is sort of tethered, not too much. Do you wanna move, or are you good to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Colla. Colla's in the machine. Oh, no. Are we bolting for Crafty? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're gonna get potato chips during this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It depends. What did they have on Crafty?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They got ginger beer and all sorts of shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they have trail mix?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're always out of health potions by the time I get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to head for the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The green one, down at the-- yeah. That thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As far as I can go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25, 30. All right, that's as far as you can go because you used your action to do what you did. It was amazing. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fill out your 1089 before you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing continues to batter Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't it my turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Not yet. Oh. This thing tries to stick-- it pulls out the pole from inside your gut, and you feel a little (fft) as it does so. It tries to go in again, but you're ready for it, you know it's right behind you, and you manage to swivel and step out of the way. It misses. And big guy snaps away and moves back in this direction and Marisha, you're the only one who sees it, but a screen says--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I'm gonna just try to kick it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 'Cause when it moved back, it was not in melee range--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he was on the beam that swung down into it, and I'm gonna pretend like it dragged along with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like it. Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, we're making it all up as we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 plus something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, devil-child, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that was a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that was its-- that's right. Ashley's up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know you better than anyone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The 'HUSBAND' threw me off. I am going to move further that way to get away from these two that are there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going this way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, maybe just like out of range of them, touching range. So maybe just like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But which direction? This direction?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're stepping this way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Towards the lounge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Towards the lounge. As you do so, the thing takes a swipe at you. What's your AC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12? Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Velcro bodysuits don't offer a lot of armor class protection.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a hinge, a pole just goes (whirring sound) and you feel it slice the back of your neck as you go, and it takes four hit points--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Even with the helmet on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It didn't hit the helmet, it hit the neck. And you feel blood pouring down the back of this mocap suit, pooling up around your waist. You do get away from it. Did you want to go further than that, or there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I wanna go further in, towards the lounge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I wanna get in eyeshot of the big computer dude.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Actually, I'm so sorry. I want to go further in towards the bigger guy. But kinda walk around so I don't get attacked by the other one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as far as you can get unless you keep going, make a dash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll dash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you want to get right up to it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right in the face of this thing, and the screen briefly says 'ASH-O-LEE'. And then it's gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I just put down my mocap knife on the ground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you drop it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And say, I think you've created or done something that's gotten out of hand, and I forgive you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now it's Matt's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is that me right next to the-- right there, okay. If I can take two steps to get right up to the edge of where it emerged from the floor, and glance inside, what do I see below?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You see a crack going down about eight feet, and it is like five and a half, six feet wide at the most. And you see lots of cables. It looks like black spaghetti. And it's all cabled, but again, it's wet and oily. If you jumped down into that, you would be disgusting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything's wet in Liam's world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, husband.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to, if I can, move along-- move from your perspective this way two more squares, and then jump across that little bit of the gap that's there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, you can make it, you can go one more square.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, right there's where I wanna stand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thinking that they probably have a feedback set up in the cameras.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's a constitution saving throw for both of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And the DC is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They do make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that would be ten points of thunder damage, or half on a successful save, so they're not pushed, but they take five points of thunder damage each.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing, you smashed-- three iMac screens get smashed and cracked and break away, and this thing looks very haggard, but it is still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll use my last five feet of movement to try and then move alongside of the crack away from the currently still standing there creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that is a crack, so I'd say just one away from the crack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You step backward and this is not too deep, but you are now standing in-- you're not caught or anything, but you're now standing in the really slippery shit. It's also really adorable to see you two hugging at the table right now. And Marisha-- oh, you know what? I missed Neil before because I'm just-- he's a d6 in my list, so I'm gonna let Neil jump up and attack this thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: C'mon, Neil!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) He whipped his hair back and forth, he whipped his hair back and forth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that is-- okay. He grabs a hold of it and rips a screen off. (yells) (whirring sounds) "Fuck. Laura?" And it is Marisha's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, was that (whirring sounds) Neil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it turned to Neil. What was left of it turned toward Neil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And there's still that thing that's digging in the corner. Can I get to it? Where am I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're here. You can, you'd run out of juice by the time you got there. You'd have to dash to get there. You can get to that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement's 30?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what's that thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This? Matt just fucked it up with a Thunderwave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I get to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, you're right up on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can I take it by the back of its neck and push it and be like, scream real loud! We need the feedback! (yells)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do anything or yell at it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And grab it by the back of its neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mean, the brace holding the iMac's screen up? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go, scream! Scream for me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And that's it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Phantom of the Opera.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sing! Sing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an intimidation check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Oh, that's not good. Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a crackle of light, and then it makes that sound when Macs reboot and goes (bwomp).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Damn it, Macs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's about it. Laura tries to punch the-- sorry, Laura's not feeling too well. Laura attacks this thing, going, "Neil, come on! Together! Oh my goodness!" And she tries to punch at it. She hits it right in the one solid piece left on this thing and kinda hits her hand really hard. She stays there, though. She's afraid to leave Neil.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 'Cause she's a good friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Sam, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna run as fast as I can up to the big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. This one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even closer--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're gonna run out of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's okay. I just want to talk to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I just want to say to it, Liam! If you can hear me in there, hey buddy. Let's knock this off and just record our podcast, okay? We haven't done an episode in like three months. We should just do one of those instead! We got recording equipment right here, huh? What do you say, pal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight feet above you is that little camcorder screen, and you're eyeing it, you've learned by now, and it just says 'FIND ME'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'FIND ME'. That means find Liam. We have to find Liam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't Liam just get--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just heard a scream, we didn't see him die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's just too much happening. The one that Laura's-- yeah, I'm right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's right on your butt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he's just come from mangling sweet Liam O'Brien.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Travis is gonna keep him busy for a second. I'm gonna deal with the one that Laura is-- I'm gonna keep rolling around, just trying to-- I'm gonna run away from that one and try and stab the one up by-- yeah, that one over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to Crafty. Nature Valley granola bars.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're going after this one? You're attacking from where you are, or you're moving?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both. I'm not getting within-- I'm getting further from that-- oh, am I up face-up to that one? Oh, I didn't know I was face-up to that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, understood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought I was the guy below. Yeah. I'm gonna shove tentacles in it and hopefully start to wrangle it apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ranged attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grab the last one of them fruit snacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's not good. Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not there. You see a brief glow and it goes (gurgling) and they sort of curl and shrivel in on themselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis! Help!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis, what do you wanna do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm double-dashing for Crafty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! I'll remember this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your wife is right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. This is all a bad dream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. Travis ran into the pale green light spilling out of a hole in the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's green! This is going terrible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Travis!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are wasabi peas there, go, go, go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a kale smoothie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't believe you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what it was. When you said, "Travis! Help!" you were straight-up Neo. "Trinity! Help!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Its aim is bad, and it stabs into the ground. This thing swivels-- this thing is short-circuiting and bristling, sparks are flying off of it, but it rears up like a horse almost, and the legs come down, and you guys watch as two sharpened tripod legs go through Neil Druckmann's guts on the ground, and Neil gets pushed to the ground and starts screaming, and he goes (screams), and he reaches up and grabs hold of the cables on it, and as blood is going (spraying sound), he rips as hard as he can, and cables break free, and the machine just falls, broken, on top of Neil, and nothing moves there, neither move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But did he sign his NDA? Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He had so many more games to make.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The great NDA in the sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll never break NDA again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing takes two iMac-- it's got iMac palms, and it just goes (creaking sound) and does smack you in your head, but oddly, it doesn't really hurt. I mean, it hurts, but you've had worse knocks. This brand-new baby robot is not so experienced. And this guy gets up on its little pin-pokey legs and tries to scuttle around and deal with you, and actually, its back leg snaps, and it tries to stab out at you, but because these things are made out of tinkertoys, almost, it feels like, it loses its balance and the arm goes wide, and you feel it go (fwwp), and bad girl, you have trained in martial arts, you went-- you pull to the side just in time, and you feel it catch a little bit of your hair. You have a flashback of your hair being matted on a beach, and that's gone. And it is Ashley's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Talk to the big guy again and say, where do we find you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that all you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just-- depending on what he says determines what I'm going to do. Can I do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Five of six seconds go by, and the screens flash nothing. And in a split-second, you decide to...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to-- (sighs) Shit. I'm gonna start running towards the fucking green Crafty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time for Crafty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The draw's too strong for the Crafty room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 'Cause I don't think he's in that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's egg rolls out here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope it's like a Resident Evil movie-style just laser hallway, and you just walk through and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the cubes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. None of us know, we all just one by one plow through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you're running, you hear (whirring sounds) and you feel the back of your leg, rake something down the back leg of your mocap suit, and the whole back leg rips and tears, but you keep running. Five, ten, 15, 20--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to go around that thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, the other side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The other side of the chasm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where you are. Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage did she take? Did she take any damage, or is she good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She got missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Awesome. All right, seeing all this going down--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Join me in Crafty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we don't get a Welch's sponsorship after this, I'm going to pursue that shit. Yo, Welch's. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to-- she's got that one. I'm going to make 30 feet towards Taliesin while shouting out, Liam, are you okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't hear anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to, as I look over at Taliesin facing off with the creature, I'm like, you're adorable, and you've got this. You've adorably got this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm giving you an insipiration die. A d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are adorable. Well, you were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm going to dash up towards the ramp in the back corner, just to see what remains of Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Taliesin's cheeks turn even rosier as you run off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was so marketable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get up here. It's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Like he has a few minutes left to live, or no, it's fucking Chef Boyardee. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, Liam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's be descriptive, shall we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't even see a face anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Well, that's definitely the end of my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I have this guy? It's just me and him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And he's a robot, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a robot. It's moving camera equipment and highly expensive performance-capture equipment, repurposed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Highly expensive camera equipment, repurposed. Okay. Can I sweep his leg and go into a combat triangle and take him down, and then be like, where's your failsafe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course you can. This is D&D. Roll to attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course you can do all of that. Go offline.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's deal with the sweep-the-leg part first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sweep the leg. Don't fuck me, Gil! That's a natural one, Gil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your foot traces an arc and goes (impact noise) and stops and does not move past its leg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go: There's a firewall! There's a fucking firewall!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to use your second monk attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have another one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Bonus, yeah. Action and bonus. You're right there. Roll again. You just completed a kick. Maybe you can punch it in the goolies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to punch and see if I can grab its cords and rip it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Split-second later, roll to attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cocked. 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, your foot goes (impact noise), gets stopped. (grunts) In a very Marisha fashion, (impact noise, mechanical noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (uncertain noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Laura's turn. Laura collapses by Neil and starts pushing this thing off Neil and starts saying, "Neil! Neil!" and she starts shaking at him and crying over his body. There's blood in his beard and it's really sad. You guys almost don't have the heart to go on, but you'd better. Sam, what do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said "find me" but he's dead. I guess I didn't see what you saw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) He's at Crafty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Find me at Crafty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to kick the robot in the robot nuts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it. Right in the SD card belly-button that Marisha's doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your fist, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I rolling, a d4?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One? It takes two hit points of damage. You punch it right in its belly-button and you watch as this thing that Marisha pointed out when she was down under there, you watch this cylinder go (crunch) and get knocked out of place, and the thing goes (mechanical winding-down noise, ratcheting). It keeps going, but you saw shit happen when you just hit that thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. For my bonus action, I will say, please hit it in its glowing naughty bits, please. Oh, wait. Everyone's gone to Crafty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bye, everyone!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin's up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and circle around this thing and get a better shot at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At this guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one that's got me stuck here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. Do you want to move?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to circle around him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Are you going to give it the tentacle concho?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to tentacle kancho.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kancho.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kancho.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we are kancho-ing here. Big purple concho. I'm going to add. 11!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been abandoned by whatever dark force you wooed into bed, Taliesin. You are not turning it on right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's because Matt's sitting in my chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cackles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could do it. You're running towards it, and again, the same kinds of tubing and what look like veins or innards, except mechanical at the same time, are spiraling up the length of this tube and then out of sight. You can definitely go up it, but it's not this, it's this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to be clear, no tables or cans of Sterno?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing but a tube.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm bolting up that tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you are. Okay. It does not change. You run a full 60 feet, and you're just booking it in your little short-shorts and polo shirt and going (pants) and that's where we'll leave you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got this, Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Saving the day. (sings) Saving the day!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gone. I'm going to say that it backs you up five feet, going (mechanical noises). Nope. This thing, I'm going to say that you've moved with it, Taliesin, just for funsies. It's slow-moving, and you continue to move around. You're ashamed, but still awake and alert. Ash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are they connected to the computers that are already in the muck? All of the ones that are in the pod area?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was here is here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to abandon this. Can I get to Taliesin in this turn, or no?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get to him, but you can't do anything, or you can get here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, but I can get back to the big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get back to the big guy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to go back to the big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right there with your buddy Sam. What would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to kick that SD card, the glowing thing at the bottom, again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you still have an inspiration?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Did Matt inspire you or Taliesin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, earlier. She used hers in the last battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. We can't hit shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've cut the skin on your knuckles, and it is still just leaning on Riegel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where do we find you? Answer me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That makes you a bad computer. That's my Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So in the midst of this horror, you're worried that you're going to die, but your gallows humor kicks in and fuck it. Fuck this thing. And you lash out at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm angry! It's been completely unhelpful, even if it is Liam. You've got LCD screens at your disposal and you're giving us vague hints? No. Fuck that noise.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the save?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I cannot do anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't do anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just like real life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, where are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. At the end of my turn, I turn back to Taliesin and go: yeah, but seriously, do something! Come on! You worked with Spielberg, asshole! I give you my last inspiration die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You worked with Spielberg?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a crack in the hole? In the ground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right there? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crack in the hole?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The crack in the hole. There's a hole in the crack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a hole in the bucket, dear Liza, dear Liza. Okay, there's an evil bad guy and then a crack in the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing is looking rough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's looking rough?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get there in time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To this? Yeah, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Okay. I'm going to say, none of this is being saved on the internet, guys! It's fine! And I do a double punch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. Roll twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Demogorgon left an impact on her, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16. And then the second one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should have backed up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good. 17. 16 and 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll for damage on both.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's 1d4 plus three? Three plus three is six, and then one plus three is four. Six and four, ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You come through and one hand slams into its third leg and breaks right through and it falls forward, no longer having a third leg to stand on, and its little belly button is right there, and you go (grunts) and punch. That cylinder goes, (metallic thudding) and rolls off into the corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunts) Fuck you, cloud storage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are on a rampage about backing up data.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, backup data. You're easily hackable. It's not fair!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like if we would have had a good sponsor tonight, it would have been Backblaze, a fantastic service for backing up your information.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If only Backblaze was sponsoring us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura drags Neil's body away from the gap and lays him out. Sam, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna use my-- Because the robot is dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The big one, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As far as I know, Liam is dead. I'm going to use my ranger senses--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Technically, there is voiceover recording done on these sets, so you are in your favored territory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knew it! I knew it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look and see if I see anything out of the ordinary. Any sign of a hidden door or a chamber that I missed before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got you, boo. Your eyes dart all around this room. Anything out of the ordinary in this fucking crazy room. You see the hole in the wall that Verno booked it out of. There's an exit sign above that door, but it doesn't say exit. You didn't see it until now. It says, 'COME'.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) I come in my pants.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You solved the game! You won Dungeons and Dragons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (giggling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I book it to the door, and I say: as always, follow seven-year-old me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as far as your little legs go. You are running in a tube. Still going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Isn't it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. You're right. Sorry, two T names.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to circle around and try one more time. I think I've been trying to get too fancy with this thing, so I'm going to try to hit it through the ground. Try and line it up and give the slap attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So sad. What good deed did you do? What preppy outfit did you wear to make the eldritch gods abandon you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really tough to get an eldritch god to listen to you when you have this haircut. There's a reason it's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe the robot is secretly made of fish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The big watery eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to break and run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It obviously takes a swing, but with its natural one-- this is the one that has the stubby T-Rex iMac hands, and it goes (whoosh) and not much happens. You break away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I run to the green.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where you are. It follows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to catch him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now, that iMac, which you didn't get too good a look at it because you're fucking freaked out, slices down into your shoulder blade, and it is very sharp on the side, it is not normal, and you feel an iMac suddenly go (slicing noise) and blood starts to pool down inside the mocap suit. Two hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we reset hit points at the top of this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When you were reborn unto Naughty Dog? Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that came out weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knowing that I have an intelligence of 12, which is double what I usually work with, and that color is green, which is what geniuses choose, I continue down the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so there's a light on the wall. It's unsteady. Ashley, what do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to pick up the little SD card thingy that flew away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It got flung over here. Sorry, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leave it. You can't read that. What are you, a computer?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if Liam's in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck Liam. He's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam's in the cloud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam yells out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is some Lawnmower Man shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please no. Please no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to start running toward Taliesin and start making my way out, but also a little more toward--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Making my way downtown--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sings) Walking fast, 30 feet to Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So inspirational.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There. Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I see everyone else booking in that direction, and most of the danger on the other side of the room is gone, so I'm going to go ahead and continue that way, as well. Full movement. And as that's happening and as Taliesin's facing off against the one standing camera, I'm going to be like: hey, by the way! The rest of your equipment was shitty. I guess that means you are, too! Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yay! (singing) It takes four psychic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Your voice-- again, it makes no sense, but because you're so pure, your insult reverberates through, and it, nonsensically, comically, goes, (mechanical noise) and it falls and an iMac goes (thudding) and it explodes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a shower of sparks as Taliesin's on the other side of the camera, I just say, sometimes you've just got to remind them. That's my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do, very distantly, hear (huffing breaths).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, I think we lost Travis.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura starts saying, "Travis!" She leaves Neil and runs to that green door and shouts your name as loud as she can up the tube, and you hear it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, come this way! Come up this way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we run for the green gap, I say, I saw 'NO' on the screen. What did you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to wait, or are you still running as fast as you can?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somebody needs an actor or character actor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, the rest of you guys make your way. It's very unsettling. As soon as you walk in, luckily you're not being attacked by moving machinery anymore, but now you're in the dark, mostly. You find your way up to little Travis, and you have a moment to breathe for a second. You're in this tube. The sides of it now, as you walk a little further, start to-- all the cabling and wiring that I mentioned before starts to lessen. You guys walking forward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Running forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Running forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm checking for traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been running after everything that you've seen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to roll to check for traps?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you a rogue?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. What do I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an eight. It's clear!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get behind Sam!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go behind T!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a tracker!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we running or walking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're out of your favored terrain, I will say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I might do a speed walk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley's trailing behind. You're moving really fast. You guys jog upward in this tunnel for two minutes, five minutes. Still in the dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's dark? Sam, do you have another resume and picture?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I only have one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You only had one resume?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you put the effort of running into this dialogue, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need effort of running in that dialogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay, sorry. (panting) When I smile, I create a dim light with my teeth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guys, you all have cameras on the front of your helmets. Why are you shining lights into your own fucking faces? Turn them around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. We still have battery packs, don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. I thought that was an aura of blindness. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's glass, and it is a perfect tube, but you can't see anything out there. It's dark. And you've been running for ten minutes now. Still going up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably two miles, right, Travis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really haven't had a chance to play with my crazy powers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your crazy powers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean the tentacles that have been shooting out of your fucking fingers?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your special purpose?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My special purpose.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like to do, creepy kid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and make a purple glow happen behind the glass. I want to try and see what's behind. I'm going to touch the glass and try and force a psychic light behind it so I can see. A gothy psychic light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. A very bright lavender exudes out from your hands. And through it, you see-- it's hard to describe the texture of it, but you see nothing above and then stretching away from the lower end of the tunnel on the side you're looking at, what looks like mottled, scaly, black teflon or hide or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guys! Guys! Guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I peek in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's scaly teflon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all stop running--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sequins!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't look natural. It looks synthetic.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sequins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sequins, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- ground, but it doesn't look like dirt or trees or anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it carbon fiber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it adamantium?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your head out of your ass, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and keep enough light, and keep projecting a tiny bit of light in this tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you walk forward? Are we walking now, or are you going to continue to do a 5K?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's walk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't we try to break the glass?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I kind of want to see what's on the other side of it. I mean, yeah, break it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been going a long time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, ten minutes is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two miles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing, are we breaking glass, or are we continuing on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll continue on for a bit more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a minute more.

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You walk for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These shoes are uncomfortable. They smell like other people's feet!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slightly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's keep going!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Onward ho?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe after a minute. (heavy breathing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Matt!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You okay, babe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does anyone have some water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! Hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could wring out this mocap suit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look to the future.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're almost there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look to the future.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hate P.E. for very specific reasons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I was working on it when I ended up here. To be fair, it's making me feel a lot better about spending time doing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards the campaign guide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going. Good. We're good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You walk for 20 more minutes, climbing, climbing and seeing this ill-looking shimmer that reminds you so much of the Valley. Eventually, some change. You see an arch ahead and through it some sort of larger chamber, as best you can tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Riegels first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, On me, guys. On me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On your six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go on in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone's on Sam's six?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm on your six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On Rie. Sam Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No reaction of any kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does there appear to be any other exit in the room, or is it just the chamber that we've entered now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't see anything. It's just a mess in front of you, behind Liam, and in the dead center of the dome, ten feet tall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it connected to anything? Any computers, anything else in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't see anything in the front, but yeah, the mess behind it does trail down to the back of this cylinder. You see lumps and cables all twisted around each other, and in the mess of greenish-tinted wires, cabling, and pulsing innards, you see different portions of machinery light up in different shades. Some places darker, some lighter. Some of it pushed out, and some of it pushed back. And you feel like you're seeing an optical illusion, in a way, and after a couple of seconds as these things move and shift, you see a visage of your friend's face, larger than life, filling the wall. And he is looking at you so fondly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll step forward and say, hey, dude. Can you hear us or talk to us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (speak-and-spell voice) "My friends. Oh how I have missed you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I walk up next to Sam and put my hand on the glass and just say, Liam, we missed you, too, but did you do all this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you at the cylinder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I put my hand on the glass of the cylinder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you looking right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm looking towards his face on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the wall or in the glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, in the glass. I know it's on the wall, but I'm focusing on the cylinder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You see the barest little-- and that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (speak-and-spell voice) "I know--"

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: (laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "This may be hard to take in. I am Liam, your old friend. Matthew, there is so much I wish "to tell you, but it is hard to know where to begin." And the illusion of his face isn't perfect. There's little jumps and he seems distracted, slightly, and he just seems off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look at his body in the cylinder and I say, how did this happen, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "The reason why I am here and the grasp of physics that it entails are difficult for even me "to understand, let alone impart. I feel them on an instinctual level, but I have been so lonely "without you. I have been on my own for exactly 8,642 years."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a single tear rolling down my cheek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "It was a mistake."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're able to focus hard enough to tear through time and space, are you able to send us back to a time before you were taken?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I can break the loop. I have been trying to pull you to me for a very long time." You see small screens you weren't even aware you were there. Rounded over part of the tubing mess, you see there are all these little screens. They're blurry. They're not very clear, but you can make out-- you see yourselves in each of them. The group of you on a space shuttle. In another one, you see yourselves on an old ship in the middle of the ocean. You see yourselves moving through the streets, the fake streets of Warner Bros. You see yourselves standing together arm in arm on the wall of a castle. In another one, you see cartoon versions of yourselves. "I pulled you out of our "line and spread you across many. I am so sorry for any pain I have caused you, and I have been here "for so long."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Liam, how long have you actually been here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. I definitely wrote that down. (laughs) 8,642. Verbatim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "My friends, I want to do right by you. I want to send you home, but I am the lynchpin. You "need to break me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break you? Break the glass?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we take you out of there? What happens?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Then I will die, and you will go home. If I fall, you will rise. That is my hope."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any other options?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Travis."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I know you will do what needs to be done."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, he won't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Ash-o-lee."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I am not the man you knew. I don't want to go on for 9,462 years. I want to rest."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it stop at 9,000?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "The number was arbitrary." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's what I was trying to get at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's still our Liam.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's what I was trying to get at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mechanical laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you're still in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we have to kill him to save ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Sam."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, old man Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Let me go."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But who will I do All Work No Play with anymore?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "They can listen to our less than 20 episodes again." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't even get to 20? That's so pathetic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "There are worse things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could get a new cohost. I mean, Taliesin's charming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do a solo show, and I'll take outtakes, and I'll make some sort of a Liam generator. He'll just sound sad all the time. It'll be just like you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "My friends, there is no shame in this. I wanted to see you again, and I have, but I am not "meant to be."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Were you following us at one point, as an old man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Travis, I know you will do what needs to be done."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Taliesin, kill this motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we all have to hit the glass together, and I think that this is something that is not at all metaphorical for something Liam is going through in real life. I think this is just in the D&D game. No, we're going to do this. We're going to all hit the glass together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there has to be a way. There has to be an alternative.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why won't Matt's way work? If we go back to before any of this happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you can alter time paths, if you can actually tear us from different realities, does it only work forward? Can you send us backward, as well? If you're the lynchpin in this, do you have the ability to send us back to the time you had pulled us from originally?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I know you think I would have all the answers, but I do not."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then try, at least. If you haven't calculated that, but you're able to tear through time, could you try and send us back? We could still close the lynchpin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I will try, but if it does not work, and I die, I have been alone for thousands of years, and "there are things that I have wanted to say. Will you indulge me for a moment longer?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. We will indulge you for just another thousand years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taliesin, just kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's got something to say!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the mini-USB?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Thank you all. It was ever a pleasure." The face disappears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we wait, or do we strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we do not strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go to the back of the cylinder and just see what's back there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Splattered against the back of the glass is all the same wiring and disgusting cabling. It's slick, and it branches away and spreads out against the entire back half of this chamber.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it's connected to something? Do the wires just go back into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's impossible to tell. It's all a mass of spaghetti.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) We can't kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then we just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody show me another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm trying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if we unplug him, he still dies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if he-- here's the thing. Unplugging him or destroying him here, as far as we understand, may not have an effect on a time loop circumstance, or at least, it's not going to change reality from where it was. He's bending and destroying the fabric, or is able to pull us across realities. That ability still stands. I want to implore once more, and I step forward to the cylinder, putting both hands on it and trying to, wherever the currently-wandering gaze of Liam is in there, I put both hands up, my red Hawaiian shirt soaked with sweat, mist in the air, and probably dampened a bit with tears across my lapel. I look up and try to meet the gaze and say, trust us. If you're better to have known us, send us back where we can know you again and fix this before it happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I grab Matt's hand and say, yeah, buddy. It's all good. This isn't real. And I put my hand on the glass, as well, and say, it's all good. Send us back, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll also put my hand on the glass and join hands with these guys and say, thank you for guiding us here and through this all. You've been a trusted friend, and if we are all one person together, you have been our heart, and it will certainly break to say goodbye to you, but thank you for letting us go the way that you have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my hand on the glass. Please, just try. I think there are so many more adventures to have, and I think there's a better future to be written. For all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She doesn't say anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And hand on the glass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she just quietly does the same.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (imitating Laura) "I'm barfing right now, so--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The face does not reappear, but much fainter, you hear the piping vibrate again and say, "If you will not end it, I cannot free you." And behind you, far in the distance, you hear (explosion noise). You look back, behind you and out the glass, and you see far on the horizon, one of those black spires rising up. Just as you turn-- it's already happened; you're seeing the aftermath. (explosion noise) Explosion off the side of one of those. Two seconds later, (explosion noise) one slightly closer. (explosion noise)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) We have to kill him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (booming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do any of us want it to end, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like mousetraps throwing a ping-pong ball down on them, all those lights are going (explosion noises). Increasing in frequency to the point where it's an oncoming wall of green fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I always knew I'd die young.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we just going to let this happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only the good die young.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what? We're dying on a Thursday doing what we love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm okay with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The glass grows bright green-white light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Family?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Family.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you look over and Liam is sitting in a black baseball cap and a shirt and he looks up and says, (laughs) "Are you guys all right? Are you taking a nap?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the fucking air conditioning broke today, that's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really uncomfortable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so hot in here. (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So this is all about me, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. Are you guys ready to play?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: CREWMEMBER 1: All right, take. Are you ready? CREWMEMBER 2: All right, ready to go live! CREWMEMBER 1: All right, Denise, count them in!

lines.name: DENISE
lines.text: All right, guys, going to you in five, four--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam, let no one tell you you're talented or special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pussy pockets! (all shouting over each other) [eerie music]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was scared to death to do all of that from start to finish, and that's why I did it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Slow fucking clap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been holding onto that Speak and Spell thing for so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't believe you maintained that voice for that long. That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't laughed that hard in so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And let this be a point of inspiration for any of you burgeoning DMs out there. That's exactly the point. You are always frightened to death to do it, but you have to pull the trigger and jump in anyway because magic happens.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you, Liam O'Brien.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love you, man. That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speak and Spell Liam!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the word? What was it you asked me to spell? Farm what?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Farmhouse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: F-A-R-M-H-O-U-S-E. Farmhouse."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm out of steam, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been showing that off for so fucking long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, in little dribs and drabs, and I finally found a way to use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that, like 20 minutes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I couldn't breathe. I could not breathe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, when I do it for ten seconds in recording studios, you crack up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was in trouble.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, I need to go see my therapist after that game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was your therapy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you for coming along. Laura, I hope you're feeling better. And guys, is it the day before Wednesday day yet? (laughter) [music]
